DataElement.preferredName: Bone Marrow Neuroblastoma Tumor Burden Present Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the status or amount of neuroblastoma present in the bone marrow.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Bone Marrow Neuroblastoma Tumor Burden Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the tissue occupying the spaces of bone with presence of neuroblastic cells and tumor burden (the number of cancer cells, the size of a tumor, or the amount of cancer).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The tissue occupying the spaces of bone. It consists of blood vessel sinuses and a network of hematopoietic cells which give rise to the red cells, white cells, and megakaryocytes. :A neuroblastic tumor characterized by the presence of neuroblastic cells, the absence of ganglion cells, and the absence of a prominent Schwannian stroma formation.

Concepts.definition: The tissue occupying the spaces of bone. It consists of blood vessel sinuses and a network of hematopoietic cells which give rise to the red cells, white cells, and megakaryocytes.
A malignant neuroblastic tumor characterized by the presence of neuroblastic cells, the absence of ganglion cells, and the absence of a prominent Schwannian stroma formation.

Property.preferredDefinition: Refers to the number of cancer cells, the size of a tumor, or the amount of cancer in the body. Also called tumor load.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: Refers to the number of cancer cells, the size of a tumor, or the amount of cancer in the body.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.
